members.name: PaymentAddress.country
members.description: The Common Locale Data Repository region code. For example, US, GB, CN, etc.

members.name: PaymentAddress.addressLine
members.description: An array of strings describing the address. The exact size and content varies by country or location and can include, for example, a street name, house number, apartment number, rural delivery route, descriptive instructions, or post office box number.

members.name: PaymentAddress.region
members.description: The top level administrative subdivision of the country, for example, a state, province, oblast, or prefecture.

members.name: PaymentAddress.city
members.description: The city or town portion of the address.

members.name: PaymentAddress.dependentLocality
members.description: The dependent locality or sublocality within a city, for example, a neighborhood, borough, district, or UK dependent locality.

members.name: PaymentAddress.postalCode
members.description: A code used by a jurisdiction for mail routing, for example, the ZIP code in the United States or the PIN code in India.

members.name: PaymentAddress.sortingCode
members.description: A postal sorting code such as is used in France.

members.name: PaymentAddress.languageCode
members.description: The BCP-47 language code for the address, used to determine the field separators and the order of fields when formatting the address for display.

members.name: PaymentAddress.organization
members.description: The name of the organization, firm, company, or institution at the payment address.

members.name: PaymentAddress.recipient
members.description: The name of the recipient, purchaser, or contact person at the payment address.

members.name: PaymentAddress.careOf
members.description: The name of an intermediary party or entity responsible for transferring packages between the postal service and the recipient.

members.name: PaymentAddress.phone
members.description: The telephone number of the recipient or contact person.
